Package com.ffhs.api

Class TournamentApi

java.lang.Object
com.ffhs.api.TournamentApi
@Controller @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000") @RequestMapping(path="/tournament") @Transactional public class TournamentApi extends Object
REST endpoint for tournaments

      @PostMapping(path="/add", consumes="application/json") @ResponseBody public String addNewTournament​(@RequestBody TournamentDto tournament)
      Takes a tournamentDto object as parameter, creates a tournament model object and persists it
      Parameters:
      tournament - TournamentDto data object
      Returns:
      String success message

      Returns:

    • getMatchesForRoundRobin

      @GetMapping(path="/getMatchesRoundRobin") @ResponseBody public ArrayList<Game> getMatchesForRoundRobin​(@RequestParam int tournamentId)
      takes a tournamentId as parameter and returns(and if necessary creates) all games for the round robin format
      Parameters:
      tournamentId - int id of the tournament
      Returns:
      ArrayList<Game> list of all the games

    • saveRoundRobinScore

      @PostMapping(path="/updateRoundRobin", consumes="application/json") @ResponseBody public void saveRoundRobinScore​(@RequestBody ArrayList<Game> games)
      takes a ArrayList of round robin games and updates it
      Parameters:
      games - ArrayList of game model objects

    • getRoundRobinPlayerRanking

      @GetMapping(path="/getRoundRobinPlayerRanking") @ResponseBody public ArrayList<PlayerRanking> getRoundRobinPlayerRanking​(@RequestParam int tournamentId)
      takes a tournamentId as parameter and creates and returns the ranking of a tournament
      Parameters:
      tournamentId - int id of the tournament
      Returns:
      ArrayList<PlayerRanking> Sorted list of players with their corresponding score

    • getMatchesForSingleElimination

      @GetMapping(path="/getMatchesSingleElim") @ResponseBody public ArrayList<Game> getMatchesForSingleElimination​(@RequestParam int tournamentId)
      takes a tournamentId as parameter and returns(and if necessary creates) all games for the single elimination format
      Parameters:
      tournamentId - int id of the tournament
      Returns:
      ArrayList<Game> list of all the games

    • saveSingleElimScore

      @PostMapping(path="/updateSingleElim", consumes="application/json") @ResponseBody public ArrayList<Game> saveSingleElimScore​(@RequestBody ArrayList<Game> games)
      takes a ArrayList of single elimination games and updates it games where either of the player tags is 'TBD' are skipped because they are placeholder games
      Parameters:
      games - ArrayList of game model objects
